title: The Slide rule: multiplication and division
creator_credit: Loucks and Norling Studios and F.E. Brooker
brief_description: Explains in detail the “C” and “D” scales of the slide rule showing enlarged views of the right and left indices, the hairline and the indicator. Shows how to use the two scales for multiplication, division and combinations of these two operations.
creator_credit_for_label: Loucks and Norling Studios and F.E. Brooker
